sn21.5:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā sujāto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn21.5:4.3: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ sujātaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn21.5:4.6: yañca abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato, yassa catthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
